item.description: Update Structure Fire; INC#1605; 08:55PM; 1327 N Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x9cs6D; #EastHollywood; The unconscious adult found outside the burning unit is now described as a 65 year-old male resident in critical condition with severe burn injuries. No other persons injured. Fire cause remains under active investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E229 E235 E35 E52 E6 E82 EM14 RA52 RA82 T27 T29 T35; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1605; 08:15PM; 1327 N Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x9cs6D; #EastHollywood; PRELIM:36 Firefighters took just 20 minutes (8:35 PM) to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire in one unit at the rear of a row of one story residential bungalows. An unconscious adult (no further details) discovered outside the burning unit has been transported to a regional hospital in undetermined condition. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E229 E235 E35 E52 E6 E82 EM14 RA52 RA82 T27 T29 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0643; 10:51AM; Santa Monica Mountains; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DSkBAc; #PacificPalisades; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to an ill adult male hiker on a remote section of the Trailer Canyon Fire Road in Topanga State Park. An LAFD Flight Paramedic has been lowered to the patient, is assessing and medically stabilizing him as LAFD ground crews approach. Plan A = Soon hoisting the man aboard a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter for in-flight care during direct transport to an area hospital. No further details. ; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC9 BP23 E23 E237 E90 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA23 RH114 T37; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0183; 03:46AM; 6400 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ryCvQZ; #LakeBalboa; PRELIM: Two vehicle traffic collision with 3 patients total (unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances), two of whom were trapped in the wreckage. Two of the patients have been transported by LAFD Paramedics to a regional trauma center in Critical condition. The third patient sadly proved beyond medical help, was determined deceased and remains at the scene. No other injuries reported. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #438) and Coroner.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E290 E83 E90 EM15 HR3 RA100 RA83 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Civilian Fatality Structure Fire; INC#0118; 02:22AM; 3537 S May St; MAP: https://bit.ly/40FALGD; #MarVista; PRELIM: LAFD crew responding to an unknown type request for aid (9-1-1 hangup) arrived to find fire in a 1,096 square-foot one story home. Additional crews were assigned, and the first arriving 20 LAFD personnel had the flames fully extinguished at 2:50 AM. In searching the premises, LAFD responders discovered two persons, one male and one female (age and affiliation yet to be determined), as well as a pet cat, had perished in the flames. No other injuries were reported. Fire cause under active investigation. LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter en route (ETA 4:15 AM).; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC4 E263 E62 E63 PI3 RA63 RA862 T63; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1606; 08:23PM; 1411 S Toberman St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YtuJqN; Pico-Union; Firefighters fully extinguished a RV and tree fire in 20 minutes - preventing it from extending into any structures. An adult female was located on the ground, next to the RV (outside) with no apparent burn or respiratory injuries. The patient in being transported in fair condition. There are no other injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:03PM. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E10 E11 E13 E210 E211 E215 RA810 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue; INC#0425; 07:59AM; 5601 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Y5fAw4; Woodland Hills; An adult male construction worker fell approximately 20' down into a concrete hole (was dug out and already poured) and appears to have sustained non-life threatening injuries. It is not a trench nor confined space rescue. Firefighters are preparing for a litter basket operation using the aerial ladder truck to safely secure the patient and bring him to surface level for ground transport. The incident will scale down with a number of units being released and canceled enroute. No further details and no further updates are anticipated.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC17 E288 E293 E84 E88 E93 EM17 HR3 RA106 RA827 RA88 T88 T93 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Gold Line TA, Vehic; INC#1128; 04:49PM; 202 N Av 59; MAP: https://bit.ly/40tE7N4; Highland Park; One patient is being transported in critical condition (age/gender unknown). There was no extrication required, the patient was clear of the train. There are no other patients (no injuries on the train). The tracks are closed and riders are advised to follow @metrolosangeles on twitter for updates. LAPD Inc# 2644. No further details.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC13 BC2 E12 E212 E55 EM1 HR3 RA12 T12; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Cliff Rescue - Hoist Op 02/04/2023 INC#1220

item.description: Update Cliff Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#1220; 05:21PM; 8543 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Yg9qJk; Beverly Crest; Due to the severity of injuries to the patient and the terrain, LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist operation and air ambulance transport (patient is in *at least* serious condition). . The vehicle is resting against a tree and is not stable. Firefighters are working to stabilize the vehicle and Heavy Rescue rig is enroute to assess the situation. Mulholland Dr will remain closed from Laurel Canyon to Coldwater Canyon until the operation is complete. Drivers are advised to seek alternate routes No further details. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO2 BC14 BC5 E278 E288 E289 E97 EM14 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA88 RA89 RA97 RH114 T78 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#1220; 05:16PM; 8543 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Yg9qJk; Beverly Crest; Firefighters located the 35yo female patient is outside of the vehicle (no entrapment and no other patients) with serious injuries. Traffic closure: Crews are closing Mulholland Dr at Laurel Canyon and Coldwater Canyon - drivers are advised to avoid the area. Firefighters are preparing for a two line rope system using a litter basket while LAFD Air Ops is enroute and will lower a medic to assist in evaluating the patient. Incident Commander will determine the best method of retrieving the patient. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO2 BC14 BC5 E278 E288 E289 E97 EM14 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA88 RA89 RA97 RH114 T78 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
